execution_quality: Poor - the agent made changes that weren't visible to the user in the normal view, misunderstanding the requirements and requiring immediate correction.
work_category: UI/UX refinement to resolve interaction conflicts between long-press and details access, with removal of confirmation feedback.
summary: The agent misunderstood the user's initial request and implemented changes that only appeared in edit mode rather than the normal view where they were needed. The user's follow-up message reveals the implementation was fundamentally wrong—the agent applied a drag handle solution when the user actually wanted long-press to move items with a separate menu icon for details. This represents a critical misalignment requiring a complete rework of the approach.
follow_up_pattern: User clarified the actual requirements and reversed the previous approach, indicating the changes didn't meet expectations.
